headline: Dollar General earnings, Fedspeak, jobless claims: What to Watch
summary: Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Thursday, December 4, including earnings results from Dollar General (DG), Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), and Ulta Beauty (ULTA); commentary from Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman; and the latest reading on initial jobless claims. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Why Is Belden (BDC) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of electronic component manufacturer Belden (NYSE:BDC) jumped 5.7% in the afternoon session after investors reacted to positive news from the broader networking sector, following key innovation announcements from industry peers.

headline: United States Wireless Mouse Market Report 2025-2033, Featuring Logitech, Razer, Microsoft, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Apple, Dell, Lenovo, Samsung
summary: The United States wireless mouse market is projected to grow from US$ 635.11 million in 2024 to US$ 1.08 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 6.11%. Key growth drivers include rising demand for ergonomic devices, advanced wireless technology, and the expanding remote work and gaming sectors. As wireless technology innovations continue, and the popularity of high-performance gaming mice rises, the market's trajectory is set to accelerate. headline: HPE Disrupts Networking Industry With Expanded AI-Native Portfolio; Reimagines Future of IT Operations With Self-Driving Networks Strategy
summary: BARCELONA, Spain, December 03, 2025--HPE Discover Barcelona 2025 – HPE (NYSE: HPE) today accelerated its AI infrastructure leadership with an expansion of its secure, AI-native networking portfolio that leverages HPE Aruba Networking and HPE Juniper Networking for self-driving operations to maximize performance and scale for AI workloads. Today's portfolio expansion marks a key milestone in the integration of Juniper Networks with HPE, taking place only five months after closing the Juniper acqu
